plot: &"Meghe Dhaka Tara&" tells the tragic story of the beautiful daughter of a middle-class refugee family from East Pakistan, living in the outskirts of Calcutta under modest circumstances. Neeta sacrifices everything for her family, including her personal happiness, her money, and her health, while her achievements are hardly ever recognized by the people around her.   Written by  meitschi
title: Estrella nublada (Meghe Dhaka Tara)
